alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Calhoun, southeastern Lexington and central Orangeburg Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 553 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Sandy Run to near Bowman. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Brookdale, St. Matthews, Bowman, Elloree, Santee State Park, Claflin College, South Carolina State University, Orangeburg County Airport, Santee, Swansea, Fort Motte, Stumphole Landing and Prince of Orange Mall. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 123 and 167. Interstate 95 between mile markers 88 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg
